Class Withdrawal

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.Withdrawal
public class Withdrawal extends Object
Represents a withdrawal request for a project application. Tracks the status and details of a withdrawal process.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Withdrawal()
    Default constructor initializes withdrawal with a pending status and sets the request date to the current date.
    Withdrawal(Applicant applicant, ProjectApplication application)
    Parameterized constructor creates a withdrawal for a specific applicant and application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Withdrawal

      public Withdrawal()
      Default constructor initializes withdrawal with a pending status and sets the request date to the current date.

    • Withdrawal

      public Withdrawal(Applicant applicant, ProjectApplication application)
      Parameterized constructor creates a withdrawal for a specific applicant and application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant requesting the withdrawal
      application - The project application being withdrawn

  • Method Details

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Retrieves the current status of the withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      The status of the withdrawal

    • updateStatus

      public boolean updateStatus(String newStatus)
      Updates the status of the withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status to be set
      Returns:
      Always returns true after updating the status

    • getApplicantDetails

      public String getApplicantDetails()
      Retrieves detailed information about the applicant.
      Returns:
      A string containing the applicant's details

    • getApplicationDetails

      public String getApplicationDetails()
      Generates a string with key details of the associated project application.
      Returns:
      A string containing project and application status information

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Gets the applicant associated with the withdrawal.
      Returns:
      The applicant object

      Sets the applicant for the withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant to be associated with the withdrawal

    • getApplication

      public ProjectApplication getApplication()
      Gets the project application associated with the withdrawal.
      Returns:
      The project application object

      Sets the project application for the withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      application - The project application to be associated with the withdrawal

      Retrieves the date when the withdrawal request was made.

      The request date

      Sets the date of the withdrawal request.
      Parameters:

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the status of the withdrawal request.
